methodology: Risk tiers assigned based on patent density, enforcement history, and claim scope analysis by licensed patent attorney.

healthResearch.name: Health & Research
healthResearch.description: Healthcare data systems, research platforms, clinical trials
healthResearch.rationale: Highest patent density. 85% held by incumbents (pharma, healthcare providers). Active enforcement.

notablePatents.title: Tokenized Asset Transfer System
notablePatents.claimScope: Broad coverage of token minting, transfer, and settlement

lending.name: Lending & Borrowing
lending.description: Collateralized lending, interest protocols, liquidation systems
lending.rationale: Highly regulated vertical. Multiple incumbent patents. Active litigation.

dex.name: Decentralized Exchange
dex.description: Automated market makers, liquidity pools, swap protocols
dex.rationale: Moderate patent coverage. Some enforcement activity. Purchase advised for funded projects.

nft.name: NFT & Tokenization
nft.rationale: Lower enforcement activity. Mostly defensive patents.

rwa.name: Real World Assets
rwa.description: Tokenization of real-world assets, securities, commodities
rwa.rationale: Regulated vertical. High scrutiny from SEC and financial regulators.

CRITICAL.description: Extremely high patent density. Active enforcement. Immediate purchase recommended.

HIGH.description: High patent density. Incumbent monitoring. Purchase strongly advised.

MEDIUM_HIGH.description: Moderate patent coverage. Some enforcement activity. Purchase advised for funded projects.

MEDIUM.description: Lower patent density. Mostly defensive patents. Consider for high-profile projects.
